import React from 'react' import { FaSignInAlt, FaSignOutAlt, FaUser } from "react-icons/fa" import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { logout, reset } from '../features/auth/authSlice' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth) const onLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()) dispatch(reset()) } return (
